channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee, LLC -- Mcafee Application and Change Control (MACC)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee, LLC -- Mcafee Application and Change Control (MACC)

item.title: CVE-2020-7260|2024-09-17T02:51:46.073Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20application%20and%20change%20control%20%28macc%29
item.description: DLL Side Loading vulnerability in the installer for McAfee Application and Change Control (MACC) prior to 8.3 allows local users to execute arbitrary code via execution from a compromised folder.
